author: FrigyesNemes
body:
After line 191 two lines were added to save the perturbation result of line 176 to an array; otherwise the result remains ineffective. The changes are the exact copy of the other perturbation for "Lpx". The correction was suggested by J. Kaspar.

At line 174 the parameter "a" has been update to 2.66 instead of 0.42. The simple calculation is

                 a = delta(dLy/ds) / delta(xi) = (0.24 %) / (0.14 - 0.05 ) = 2.66 % 

the change of the uncertainty band with xi (in percent). These values / results can be found on page 8 bottom panel of this 
PPS General meeting presentation:

https://indico.cern.ch/event/1100184/contributions/4635625/attachments/2359698/4027802/optics_uncertainty_PPS_GM_F_Nemes_v2.pdf
